Description:
Salesperson:Sell store products excellently and provide advice to customers to meet their needs.
Build strong relationships with customers, enhance trust, and brand loyalty.
Work towards achieving sales goals and maintaining excellent service standards.
Maintain cleanliness and organization of the display area and clean products.Cashier :Welcome customers with a smile and provide friendly and efficient service.
Handle payment and transaction processes accurately and swiftly using the cashier system.
Record transactions precisely and ensure accurate account settlements.
Adhere to security policies and procedures, verifying customer identities when necessary.Work Hours: 5 hours per shift.Staffing: 1 employee per shift, ensuring continuous coverage.
Shifts: Two shifts are established to cover the work hours effectively.
Day Off: Friday is designated as the only day off.
Rotation: The two employees alternate working on Fridays each week.
Schedule: One week, the first employee works on Friday. The following week, the other employee works on Friday.Skills
Skills:
High school diploma at a minimum.
Previous experience (1+ years) in sales and/or cashiering.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to communicate politely with customers.
Numerical proficiency.
Ability to work quickly and efficiently in a multitasking environment.
Commitment to personal hygiene and a suitable professional appearance.
Quick learning and acquiring knowledge about provided products and services.
Flexibility in dealing with technology and cashier systems.
Dedication to the highest service standards to create a positive customer experience.
